name: Canvas Crisis
description:
You are Papigs Bapris. A painter who has been magically transported into his own canvas. Armed with a magic paintbrush, you must use your painting prowess (and magic paint!) to escape from the magical canvas. 

Will you be able to outsmart the Magic of the Canvas and make your way back to the real world, or will you be trapped forever in this painted realm? Play the game to find out!

CONTROLS:

W A S D = Move

Spacebar = Jump

1, 2, 3 = Switch paints (B, R, G)

Mouse Button 1 = Fling paint on tile

R = Restart level (with all paint erased)
